dao

Class AuthDao

  • java.lang.Object
    • dao.AuthDao

  • public class AuthDao
extends java.lang.Object
    The AuthDao class executes SQL statements on the authtoken database table.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.sql.Connection connection
      The connection to the SQL database

    • Constructor Summary

      A default constructor with no parameters

      • validateAuthToken

        public boolean validateAuthToken(AuthToken token)
        Checks that the AuthToken is in the authtoken table
        Parameters:
        token - An AuthToken object to find
        Returns:
